# UKB KDIGO-based CKD Staging Pipeline
This notebook defines shared parameters and helper functions for the CKD staging
pipeline. All subsequent notebooks source this file at the start.

## 0. Setup
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(dtplyr)
library(arrow)

options(max.print = 1000)
```

## 1. Parameters
```{r}
Project <- lst(
  name = "ukb-kdsc-staging",
  data_dir = file.path("data")
)
```

source("lib/dx_utils.R")
